= Downloading JGF =

_Note: JGF is currently in an early stage of development. Some functionality is yet to be built and some deep changes to the API should be expected. If you are interested in the project, please send us your feedback, join the user list, or contribute ideas or patches._

The source code can be accessed following the instructions at:

[http://code.google.com/p/jgf/source/checkout http://code.google.com/p/jgf/source/checkout]

= Dependencies =

In order to use JGF, you will need to add libraries or a project dependency to the 'trunk' version of [http://www.jmonkeyengine.com JMonkeyEngine] (the underlying game engine). 

Other dependencies are included in the src/main/lib directory. Those need to be added to your Java classpath at compile time and runtime.
